T02D1462:12a-0: @12a * // shr'i tsakra sam ba ra s'a dha na aa mri ta ksha ra n'a ma /

T02D1462:14b-34: rdo rje phag mo la ni 'khyud //
T02D1462:14b-35: 'khyud pa yi ni phyag gnyis la //
T02D1462:14b-36: rtse dgu kha bye rdor dril bu //
T02D1462:14b-37: phyag gzhan gnyis po dag la ni //
T02D1462:14b-38: glang chen pags pa'i na bza' 'chang //
T02D1462:14b-39: g-yas kyi phyag ni gsum pa la //
T02D1462:14b-40: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mdung 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1462:14b-41: bzhi pa la ni lcags kyu ste //
T02D1462:14b-42: lnga pa la ni gri gug ste //
T02D1462:14b-43: drug pa la ni cang te'u'o //
T02D1462:14b-44: g-yon pa'i phyag ni gsum pa la //
T02D1462:14b-45: thod pa rkang gis bkang pa'o //
T02D1462:14b-46: mchod phyir thogs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1462:14b-47: kha tv'am ga ni bsnams pa'o //
T02D1462:14b-49: de steng kha bye rtse lnga pa'i //
T02D1462:14b-50: rdo rje dang ni dril bus mtshan //
T02D1462:14b-51: dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1462:14b-52: 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa //
T02D1462:14b-53: bzhi pa la ni rdo rje zhags //
T02D1462:14b-54: lnga pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo //
T02D1462:15a-2: / sngo ser dmar po ljang gu'i zhal //
T02D1462:15a-3: drag po bzhad sgeg dpa' bo dang //
T02D1462:15a-4: rngam dang ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal //
T02D1462:15a-5: de mdun rdor rje phag mo ni //
T02D1462:15a-6: zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa //
T02D1462:15a-7: kha dog dkar po ske rags ni //
T02D1462:15a-8: thod pa'i dum bus mtshan pa'o //
T02D1462:15a-9: bcom ldan 'das zhal kha dog ltar //
T02D1462:15a-10: lha mo'i phyag gi kha dog de //
T02D1462:15a-11: dmar po ljang gu ser po dang //
T02D1462:15a-12: shin tu sngo mdog zhal gyi 'od //
T02D1462:15a-13: skra grol gcer bu g-yon pa yis //
T02D1462:15a-14: phyag 'khyud pa la ma rungs pa'i //
T02D1462:15a-15: bdud kyi khrag bkang thong pa'o //
T02D1462:15a-16: g-yas pa'i sdigs mdzub phyogs kun du //
T02D1462:15a-17: gdug pa bsdigs shing gri gug 'chang //
T02D1462:15a-18: cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams phyag / zhal nas khrag ni 'dzag pa ste //
T02D1462:15a-19: zhabs gnyis kyis ni yang dag dkris //
T02D1462:15a-20: bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid ma //
T02D1462:15a-21: snying ga'i lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1462:15a-22: ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya //
T02D1462:15a-23: ye shes 'khor lo legs bkug ste //
T02D1462:15a-24: mchod bstod byas nas gzhug par bya //
T02D1462:15a-25: 'di nyid kyis ni gnas tshogs rim //
T02D1462:15a-26: dgod bya nang gi spyor ba mchog / pull'i ra m'a la yar te //
T02D1462:15a-27: spyi bor thod pa'i dum bu dang rab tu gtum ma'o //
T02D1462:15a-28: dz'a landha ra ste spyi gtsug tu keng rus chen po dang //
T02D1462:15a-30: aoo dya na te rna ba g-yas par keng rus chen po dang 'od can ma'o //
T02D1462:15a-31: aa rbu da ste rgyab kyi char mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ste gnas so //
T02D1462:15a-33: rna ba g-yon par su ra bee ri dang /
T02D1462:15a-35: r'a ma shva ra ste smin ma'i dbus su 'od dpag med dang /
T02D1462:15a-37: de b'i ko t'i ste mig gnyis su rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1462:15a-39: dbung mgor rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so //
T02D1462:15a-40: 'di dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo sten ma nam mkha' la spyod pa'o //
T02D1462:15a-41: k'a ma r'u pa ste mchan khung dag la myu gu can dang sa srung ma'o ;
T02D1462:15a-42: / ao te ste nu ma gnyis su rdo rje
T02D1462:15a-43: ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing
T02D1462:15a-44: ngo // tri sha ku ni ste /
T02D1462:15a-45: lte bar dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
T02D1462:15a-46: ko sa la ste sna rtse ra rdo rje h'um
T02D1462:15a-47: mdzad dang chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo
T02D1462:15a-48: // ka lingga ste khar ni rab tu bzang po dang /
T02D1462:15b-2: mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang rab bzangs ma ste tshan do ha'o //
T02D1462:15b-3: k'anytsi te snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-5: mdoms su mig mi bzang dang kha ga na ste
T02D1462:15b-6: nye ba'i tsha ndo ha ste gsung gi 'khor lo
T02D1462:15b-7: sa spyod ma'o // pre ta pu ri ste /
T02D1462:15b-8: mtshan ma la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-9: gri hna de ba t'a ste bshang ba'i lam du
T02D1462:15b-10: ni rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma ste
T02D1462:15b-11: 'dus pa'o // soo r'ashta ste brla gnyis su rta mgrin dang mchu can ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-12: su barna d'i pa ste byin pa gnyis la nam
T02D1462:15b-13: mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste
T02D1462:15b-16: sor mo rnams la dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo'o //
T02D1462:15b-17: sin dh'u'i yul te rkang pa'i bol dag la padma
T02D1462:15b-18: gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste dur
T02D1462:15b-19: khrod do // ma ru'i yul te mthe bong gnyis
T02D1462:15b-20: la rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma'o
T02D1462:15b-21: khrod do // // ku lu t'a ste bus mo
T02D1462:15b-22: gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen
T02D1462:15b-23: mo ste nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02D1462:15b-24: 'di dag ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o //
T02D1462:15b-25: mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje la'o //
T02D1462:15b-26: l'a ma ni dril bu la'o //
T02D1462:15b-27: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshur ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-28: kha gdong ma ni rdo rje mdung ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-29: 'ug pa'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-30: khyi'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje gri gug ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-31: phag gi gdong can ma ni cang te'u ma'o //
T02D1462:15b-32: gshin rje brtan ma ni thod mtshan kha tv'i ga la'o //
T02D1462:15b-33: gshin rje pho nya ma ni zhags pa la'o //
T02D1462:15b-34: gshin rje mche ba can ni tshangs pa'i mgo la'o ;
T02D1462:15b-35: / gshin rje 'joms ma ni sta re la'o //
T02D1462:15b-36: byang chub kyi sems kyi snod rnams ni zhal bzhi la'o //
T02D1462:15b-39: k'a ao tri ko / ka la k'a hi /
T02D1462:15b-40: pre gri soo su na si ma ku /
T02D1462:15b-41: 'khor lo gsum ni yongs dag phyir //
T02D1462:15b-42: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yi ge bzhi //
T02D1462:15b-43: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams /
T02D1462:15b-44: byin gyis brlab par bya ba ste //
T02D1462:15b-45: gzugs kyi phung po la rnam bar snang mdzad kha dog dkar po aom las byung ba'o //
T02D1462:15b-46: tshor ba la ni rin chen rgyal po gser bsregs pa'i mdog lta bu aom las byung ba'o //
T02D1462:15b-47: 'du shes la padma gar gyi dbang phyug kha dog dmar po hr'i: las byung ba'o //
T02D1462:16a-1: la rdo rje rgyal po kha dog ljang gu ho: las byung ba'o //
T02D1462:16a-2: rnam shes nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' kha dog dkar po h'um las byung ba'o //
T02D1462:16a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dpal he ru ka kha dog nag po hi: las byung ba'o //
T02D1462:16a-4: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D1462:16a-5: nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan dbus su bzhugs //
T02D1462:16a-6: glang po myur 'gro rma bya dang //
T02D1462:16a-7: rta dang seng ge mkha' lding ste //
T02D1462:16a-8: yi dags la bzhugs rim pa bzhin //
T02D1462:16a-9: rigs drug bdag po bsam par bya //
T02D1462:16a-10: snying gar rdo rje sa gnon yin //
T02D1462:16a-11: gzhan rnams kyi ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1462:16a-13: / sna tshogs rdo rje g-yas na'o //
T02D1462:16a-14: g-yon na dril bu nga rgyal bcas //
T02D1462:16a-15: thams cad la yang spyan gsum nyid //
T02D1462:16a-16: mig dag la brum gti mug rdo rje dkar po'o //
T02D1462:16a-17: rna bdag la h'um zhe sdang rdo rje nag po'o //
T02D1462:16a-18: sna la kham ser sna rdo rje ser po'o //
T02D1462:16a-19: kha la aam 'dod chags rdo rje dmar po'o //
T02D1462:16a-20: lus la ho phrag dog rdo rje ljang gu'o //
T02D1462:16a-21: skye mched thams cad la ham /
T02D1462:16a-22: dbang phyug rdo rje kha dog dkar po'o //
T02D1462:16a-23: sa'i khams la l'am ltung byed ma ser po'o //
T02D1462:16a-24: chu'i khams la m'am 'ching byed ma nag po'o //
T02D1462:16a-25: me'i khams la t'am 'gugs byed ma gser gyi mdog can no //
T02D1462:16a-26: rlung gi khams la p'am padma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dmar mo'o //
T02D1462:16a-27: nam mkha'i khams la kham padma 'bar ma sngo nag go //
T02D1462:16a-28: lhung byed ma dang 'ching byed ma //
T02D1462:16a-29: 'gugs byed gar dang ldan de bzhin //
T02D1462:16a-30: rang rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02D1462:16a-31: zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'khor lo dang //
T02D1462:16a-32: rdo rje padma ral gri dang //
T02D1462:16a-33: gri gug g-yas kyi phyag na'o //
T02D1462:16a-34: thod pa nyid dang kha tv'am ga /'di rnams kyis ni g-yon pa mtshan //
T02D1462:16a-35: zhal gsum phyag drug lha mo ni //
T02D1462:16a-37: thod pa de dran kha tv'am ga /
T02D1462:16a-38: zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang ni //
T02D1462:16a-39: tshangs pa'i mgo dang gri gug ni //
T02D1462:16a-40: 'di yi lag pa rnams la bsam ;
T02D1462:16a-41: / aom ha snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po //
T02D1462:16a-42: na ma hi spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad ser po'o //
T02D1462:16a-43: sva h'a hu spyi gtsug tu padma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po'o //
T02D1462:16a-44: boo sha ta he dpung ba gnyis su shr'i he ru ka nag po'o //
T02D1462:16a-45: h'um h'um ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma dmar po'o //
T02D1462:16b-0: phat phat ham lus thams @16b cad la rta mchog ljang gu'o //
T02D1462:16b-1: aom bam lte bar rdo rje phag mo dmar mo /
T02D1462:16b-2: ham yom snying gar ya mi ni sngon mo /
T02D1462:16b-3: hrim mom kha la rmongs byed ma dkar mo /
T02D1462:16b-4: hrem hrim spyi bor skyod byed ma ser mo /
T02D1462:16b-5: h'um h'um spyi gtsug tu skrag byed ma ljang gu /
T02D1462:16b-6: phat phat lus thams cad la gtu ma byed ma mtshon cha du ma'i mdog 'dra ba'o //
T02D1462:16b-7: zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje can //
T02D1462:16b-8: de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1462:16b-9: rdo rje dril bu thod pa rnams //
T02D1462:16b-10: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u mgo /'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams //
T02D1462:16b-11: dril bu thod pa nyid dang ni //
T02D1462:16b-12: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u nyid //
T02D1462:16b-13: gzhan gyis phyag gi mtshon cha yin ;
T02D1462:16b-14: / phag mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma //
T02D1462:16b-15: dmar mo sngon po ljang gu zhal //
T02D1462:16b-16: gri gug thod pa nyid dang ni //
T02D1462:16b-17: zhags pa dang ni kha tv'am ga //
T02D1462:16b-18: lcags kyu de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo / lag pa rnams la 'di bsam bya //
T02D1462:16b-19: gzhan ni phyag bzhir bsgom bar bya //
T02D1462:16b-20: zhal gcig phyag ni gsum pa yis //
T02D1462:16b-21: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am dang //
T02D1462:16b-22: cang te'u dril bu de bzhin no //
T02D1462:16b-23: phag mo rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
T02D1462:16b-24: rnam snang ya mi nar dran bya //
T02D1462:16b-25: padma gar dbang rmongs byed ma //
T02D1462:16b-26: skyong byed ma ni he ru ka / rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma //
T02D1462:16b-27: rta yi mchog ni gtu ma byed ma //
T02D1462:16b-28: thugs la h'um yig rdo rje yin //
T02D1462:16b-29: aa ni ngag gi lam du gnas //
T02D1462:16b-30: yi ge aom ni sku rdo rje //
T02D1462:16b-31: nag po dmar po dkar po rim //
T02D1462:16b-32: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
T02D1462:16b-33: nam mkha' kun du khyab bltas te //
T02D1462:16b-34: bdud rtsi lnga yis yongs gang ba'i //
T02D1462:16b-35: thod pas dbang bskur tshig 'di yis //
T02D1462:16b-36: dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya //
T02D1462:16b-37: ji ltar bltams ba tsam gyis ni //
T02D1462:16b-38: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba //
T02D1462:16b-39: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1462:16b-40: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02D1462:16b-41: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um //
T02D1462:16b-42: phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur //
T02D1462:16b-43: bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod //
T02D1462:16b-44: zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo //
T02D1462:16b-46: rigs skyes ma mo skyes de bzhin //
T02D1462:16b-47: mi snang mkha' spyod de bzhin no //
T02D1462:16b-48: dma' bar skyes dang mchog de bzhin //
T02D1462:16b-49: bar ma rnam pa sna tshogs mchog / sa spyod mkha' spyod de bzhin no //
T02D1462:16b-50: sa yi 'og na gnas pa dang //
T02D1462:17a-1: sbyin mo dang klu mo dang //
T02D1462:17a-2: dri za mo dang mi 'am ci //
T02D1462:17a-3: rig pa 'dzin pa sngon grub pa //
T02D1462:17a-4: gang yang bde gshegs brten pa dang //
T02D1462:17a-5: dkon mchog gsum la mos gang dang //
T02D1462:17a-6: de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor lo //
T02D1462:17a-7: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D1462:17a-8: glu dang gar gyi mchod pa dang ;
T02D1462:17a-9: / sna tshogs gang dang 'dod mchog gis //
T02D1462:17a-10: he ru ka la mchod pa byed //
T02D1462:17a-11: rlung dang me yi dkyil steng du //
T02D1462:17a-12: aa las grub ba'i thod pa la //
T02D1462:17a-13: ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D1462:17a-14: yi ge bcu drug bam dang ni //
T02D1462:17a-15: aom sogs yi ge gsum byin brlabs //
T02D1462:17a-16: 'khar gsum yang dag spros bsgom bya //
T02D1462:17a-17: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang //
T02D1462:17a-18: du ma skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02D1462:17a-19: g-yon du bskor zhing rab bskor bas //
T02D1462:17a-20: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed //
T02D1462:17a-22: de bzhin l'a ma byang du yin //
T02D1462:17a-23: nub tu du ma skyes ma nyid do //
T02D1462:17a-24: lho ru gzugs can ma nyid do //
T02D1462:17a-25: mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog nag //
T02D1462:17a-26: l'a ma kha dog ser mor bshad //
T02D1462:17a-27: dum skyes ma ni dmar mo yin //
T02D1462:17a-28: gzugs can ma ni ljang gu'o //
T02D1462:17a-29: zhal gcig phyag rgya lnga yis mtshon //
T02D1462:17a-30: bzhi po kun kyang phyag bzhi ma //
T02D1462:17a-31: spyan gsum skra ni grol ba dang //
T02D1462:17a-32: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am ga / cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams //
T02D1462:17a-33: bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa'o //
T02D1462:17a-34: mtshams su gser dang dngul sogs kyi //
T02D1462:17a-35: bum pa'i steng du gzhag bya ba //
T02D1462:17a-36: kun da lta bu'i bdud rtsi bzhi //
T02D1462:17a-37: byang chub sems kyi thod pa'o //
T02D1462:17a-38: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su /
T02D1462:17a-39: pull'i ra m'a la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang rab tu gtum mo dkar mo dang /
T02D1462:17a-40: byang du dz'a lan dha rar keng rus chen po dang //
T02D1462:17a-41: gtum pa'i mig can ma ser mo /
T02D1462:17a-42: nub tu aoo dya na du keng rus dang 'od can ma dmar mo /
T02D1462:17a-43: lhor aa rbu dar mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ljang gu'o //
T02D1462:17a-44: me'i phyogs go d'a ba r'i ra lha dgra dang //
T02D1462:17a-45: brtan pa'i blo can ma sngo skya ma'o //
T02D1462:17a-46: bden bral du r'a me shva r'ir dpag med dang mi thung ma dkar ser ro //
T02D1462:17a-47: rlung gi phyogs de b'i ko t'i ra rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ljang gu'o //
T02D1462:17a-48: dbang ldan du m'a la bar rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma padma'i kha dog ste /
T02D1462:17a-49: thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1462:17b-0: skra grol spyan ni gsum @17b pa'o ;
T02D1462:17b-2: gdug pa'i sdigs mdzub rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1462:17b-3: gtsug rgyan rna rgyan mgul rgyan dang //
T02D1462:17b-4: rkang rgyan tshangs pa'i srad bu can //
T02D1462:17b-5: mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul du brgyan //
T02D1462:17b-6: ske rags sil sil sgra sgrogs nyid //
T02D1462:17b-7: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i //
T02D1462:17b-8: dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1462:17b-9: rang mtshan ral pa'i cod pan can //
T02D1462:17b-10: snying rjes grags shing 'jigs par mdzad //
T02D1462:17b-11: 'khyud pa yi ni phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D1462:17b-12: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin par mdzad //
T02D1462:17b-13: cang te'i kha tv'am lag gzhan la //
T02D1462:17b-14: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas pa //
T02D1462:17b-15: g-yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas ;
T02D1462:17b-16: / thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod yin //
T02D1462:17b-17: gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar k'a ma r'u par myu gu can dang sa srung ma dkar mo'o //
T02D1462:17b-18: byang ao ter rdo rje ral ba can dang 'jigs byed chen mo dmar mo'o //
T02D1462:17b-19: nub tu tri sha ku ner dpa' bo chen mo dang rlung gi shugs can ma nag mo'o //
T02D1462:17b-20: lho kos lar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang chang 'thung ma ljang gu ma'o //
T02D1462:17b-21: me'i phyogs ka ling gar rab tu bzang po dang /
T02D1462:17b-22: lha mo sngo bsangs ma ser mo'o //
T02D1462:17b-23: bden bral lam pa kar rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo dkar mo'o //

T02D1462:23a-35: zad med mkha' sku mthe chung la //
T02D1462:23a-36: sen mo rnams la rta mgrin nyid //
T02D1462:23a-37: dpa' bo thams cad kyi ni gnas ;
T02D1462:23a-38: / g-yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin //
T02D1462:23a-39: pho nya mo rnams lag mthil la //
T02D1462:23a-41: dpa' bos brda lnga rab tu bstan //
T02D1462:23a-42: sa ni spyan mar bshad pa ste //
T02D1462:23a-43: chu khams m'a ma k'ir dran byas //
T02D1462:23a-44: gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dag / me dang rlung du rab tu grags //
T02D1462:23a-45: tsum pa ka ni stong pa nyid //
T02D1462:23a-46: pha rol phyin pa de bzhin no //
T02D1462:23a-47: dbus ni dpa' bo kun gyi gnas //
T02D1462:23a-48: mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol //
T02D1462:23a-49: de ltar dpa' bos brda bstan nas //
T02D1462:23a-50: de snod gcig la bza' bar bya //
T02D1462:23a-51: a'a li k'a li sngon bsams nas //
T02D1462:23a-52: rnal 'byor chen pos ngal ba so'o//
T02D1462:23b-0: @23b rab mchog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1462:23b-1: lte ba'i dbus su gnas par bsgom //
T02D1462:23b-2: yi ge'i gnas kyi mchog gyur pa //
T02D1462:23b-3: de yi dbus su gnas par bsam //
T02D1462:23b-4: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1462:23b-5: lha yi sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1462:23b-6: de yi lus ni gnas par gyur //
T02D1462:23b-7: sems nyid bsgom par bya ba min //
T02D1462:23b-8: bsam du med pa bsam pa nyid //
T02D1462:23b-9: bsam pa de yang mtshan ma med //
T02D1462:23b-10: bsam gyis mi khyab de yang bsam //
T02D1462:23b-11: de rjes rig pa 'dzin thob gyur //
T02D1462:23b-12: pukka s'i ni yang dag thob //
T02D1462:23b-13: gzhan yang lang tsho'i gzugs kyis mtshan //
T02D1462:23b-15: / dam tshig ldan zhing brtul zhugs ldan //
T02D1462:23b-16: 'dod med ngo tsha chung ba dang //
T02D1462:23b-17: brtan zhing ser sna med pa dang //
T02D1462:23b-18: bdag tu 'dzin dang bral ba yi //
T02D1462:23b-19: rig ma brtul zhugs de lhan cig / sngags rig bdag nyid kyis ni spyad //
T02D1462:23b-20: aa yig sna rtse ra yang dag sbyar //
T02D1462:23b-21: mtshan ma'i nor bus bam dgod bya //
T02D1462:23b-22: lte ba snying ga lkog ma dang //
T02D1462:23b-23: dpral ba yi ni gnas rnams su //
T02D1462:23b-24: sngags tshogs bcas pas byin gyis brlab //
T02D1462:23b-25: dang por dga' dang bcas pa yis //
T02D1462:23b-26: dang por dga' ba ye shes so //
T02D1462:23b-27: mchog tu dga' ba dngos grub mchog / lhan cig skyes ba bla med pa'o //
T02D1462:23b-29: rnal 'byor cho ga rim pa bzhin //
T02D1462:23b-30: 'khor lo bzhi dang bden pa bzhi //
T02D1462:23b-31: skad cig bzhi la yang dag brten //
T02D1462:23b-32: dga' ba dpa' bor gsungs pa ste //
T02D1462:23b-33: dam par dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1462:23b-34: mchog tu dga' ba thams cad rig / thabs de'i bde bas thams cad nyid //
T02D1462:23b-35: drug pa thugs kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1462:23b-36: dpal ldan he ru ka ru sprul //
T02D1462:23b-37: dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1462:23b-38: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02D1462:23b-39: rtag tu gdungs shing rab gdungs pas //
T02D1462:23b-40: gdungs las skye bo kun grol phyir //
T02D1462:23b-41: dus 'dir mi thub zla ba yi ;
T02D1462:23b-42: / sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'dzag /'khor lo gcig pa'i grong khyer na //
T02D1462:23b-43: tshong dpon bu mo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1462:23b-44: gnas pa rdo rje phag mo'i sprul //
T02D1462:23b-45: de bkas sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bris //
T02D1462:24a-0: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba slob @24a * //
